data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
With reference to the aforementioned subject, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today i.e. 13th February, 2021 have inter-alia:

1. Approved and taken on record the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company along with the Review Report dated 13th February, 2021 issued by the statutory auditors M/s. Singhi & Co., Chartered Accountants, for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December, 2020 (Copy enclosed), in terms of Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

2. Declared and approved payment of Second Interim Dividend for the financial year 2020-21 @ Rs.3/- (Rupees Three) per Equity share of face value of Rs.2 /-.
